description:
Mom and the gang visit a super bathhouse! Dad is all fired up and causing a ruckus all over the place. He then encounters an elderly, hermit-like man called the "bathhouse chief."; Fumi`s friend Ako is over to play. While Mom isn`t looking, Bunji is drawn into a crazy session of playing house with the girls; The class representative from Bunji`s school, Nochiharu, is leaps and bounds a better student than Bunji. He begins to back Bunji up when playing and at school...; The girls from Bunji`s class come over to play. Something doesn`t feel right, and Mom has a bad feeling. Just as she thinks this, they say they want to see her draw manga...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: That`s the super bath house / Playing House / You are reliable / Mrs. Manga Writer
ザッツ・スーパー銭湯 / おままごと / 君が頼りだ / まんが家さん
